description: This file is a shell script that manages starting, stopping, and restarting a service named 'cosa'. It includes functions for service control, event handling, and source references to utility scripts. It defines default event handlers for service lifecycle events and processes commands passed as script arguments.

methods.name: cosa_start
methods.description: Starts the 'cosa' service by executing 'cosa_start.sh' script located in /usr/ccsp directory.

methods.name: service_start
methods.description: Handles the startup process of the 'cosa' service, including setting status, invoking 'cosa_start', and error checking.

methods.name: service_stop
methods.description: Handles stopping the 'cosa' service, including killing related processes and updating status.
